Package framework.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AbstractException
    Basis for all other Exceptions of the System.
    AuthorizationException
    Exception thrown when actions are attempted by components (control interfaces or modules) without proper rights.
    BrokerException
    Exception thrown when broker errors occur.
    ControlInterfaceException
    Exception thrown when a control interface produces an error or uses invalid values.
    DatabaseException
    Exception thrown when there is a database error.
    DataContainerException
    Data container exception.
    ModuleException
    Can be thrown be modules to indicate errors but is also used to wrap other uncatched exceptions from modules.
    WrongBrokerStateException
    Exception thrown when actions are attempted while the broker being in the wrong state.
    WrongControlInterfaceStateException
    Exception thrown when actions are attempted while control interface being in the wrong state.
    WrongModuleStateException
    Exception thrown when actions are attempted while module being in the wrong state.
    WrongSystemStateException
    Exception thrown when actions are attempted while the system being in the wrong state.
